# File lib/thinking_sphinx/source/sql.rb, line 15
      def to_sql(options={})
        sql = "SELECT "
        sql += "SQL_NO_CACHE " if adapter.sphinx_identifier == "mysql"
        sql += "\#{ sql_select_clause options[:offset] }\nFROM \#{ @model.quoted_table_name }\n\#{ all_associations.collect { |assoc| assoc.to_sql }.join(' ') }\n\#{ sql_where_clause(options) }\nGROUP BY \#{ sql_group_clause }\n"

        sql += " ORDER BY NULL" if adapter.sphinx_identifier == "mysql"
        sql
      end
